params.authorization: Authentication data provided to the permitter to make its decision.
params.context: Non-authentication data provided to the permitter to make its decision.
params.duration: The requested lifetime of the permit, which may be different from lifetime actually granted.
params.identity: The identity that the requester wishes to acquire.
params.requester: The account to which the identity permit will be issued.

returns.expiry: The timestamp at which the permit expires, which may be different from the request timestamp plus the requested duration.

acquireIdentity(bytes32,address,uint64,b.notice: Requests that the permitter trigger the upstream identity registry to grant an identity.

upstream().notice: Returns the the upstream permitter or identity registry called upon successful identity acquisition/release.
